BreadcrumbDescription: I learned at Ked Bardu that a pale man dressed in black has been seen in Abahru Canyon. If that was Elias, a former Horadrim, I fear what lies ahead.
Callback16Header: Speak with Lorath in Abahru Canyon
Callback222Header: Help Lorath search for clues in the Carver's House
Callback27Header: Search for Elias in Abahru Canyon with Lorath
Callback30Header: Defeat the demons rising from the Hell rift
Name: Whittling Sanity
Phase0Description: We found a camp littered merchants with slaughtered by demons. Could Elias have summoned them? Lorath and I have a decided to descend into the canyon to look for Elias and the demons there.
Phase0OutsideSubzoneHeader: Search for Elias in Abahru Canyon
Phase120Description: The strange house in Abahru Canyon was abandoned but littered with disturbing findings. Its seems the Carver known as Genbar may be responsible for the demonic incursions, but an ancient cave nearby might have the answers we seek.
Phase120OutsideSubzoneHeader: Speak with Genbar in the Rift of a Thousand Eyes
Phase14Description: The Carver, Genbar, wracked with madness, now wields great power, bestowed on him by Elias, to summon demons. Only by killing Genbar can we prevent further summoning and return relative safety to the region.
Phase14OutsideSubzoneHeader: Defeat Genbar in the Rift of a Thousand Eyes
Phase154Description: We have discovered a strange house in the Abahru Canyon that appears untouched by demons, but no sign of any survivors. I doubt we will find any. What happened here? Whose house was this?
Phase154OutsideSubzoneHeader: Speak with Lorath in the Carver's House
Phase24Description: We have discovered a strange house in the Abahru Canyon that appears untouched by demons, but no sign of any survivors. I doubt we will find any. What happened here? Whose house was this?
Phase24OutsideSubzoneHeader: Search for clues in the Carver's House in Abahru Canyon
Phase28Description: The Abahru Canyon is full of Demons. Lorath and I have a decided to descend into the canyon and find the source of the demonic incursions.
Phase28OutsideSubzoneHeader: Close the Hell rift in Abahru Canyon
Phase63Description: We have ended the threat Genbar and his demons posed to Ked Bardu. I need to speak to Lorath about our next steps.
Phase63OutsideSubzoneHeader: Speak with Lorath in the Rift of a Thousand Eyes
Phase64Description: The Abahru Canyon is full of Demons. Lorath and I have a decided to descend into the canyon and find the source of the demonic incursions.
Phase64OutsideSubzoneHeader: Search for Elias in Abahru Canyon
Phase77Description: The strange house in Abahru Canyon was abandoned but littered with disturbing findings. Its seems the Carver known as Genbar may be responsible for the demonic incursions, but an ancient cave nearby might have the answers we seek.
Phase77OutsideSubzoneHeader: Search for Genbar in the Rift of a Thousand Eyes
Phase9Description: Chasing a lead about a pale man dressed in black seen in Abahru Canyon I must rendezvous with Lorath and learn what he might have discovered.
Phase9OutsideSubzoneHeader: Speak with Lorath in Abahru Canyon
Toast: Investigate the appearance of demons in the Abahru Rift
